actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to authorize the planning and development of the WEB Pipeline Project in South Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior to be used for planning and developing a rural water treatment and distribution system, the WEB pipeline project, in South Dakota. Directs the Secretary to transfer such appropriated funds to the Secretary of Agriculture, who shall provide the services to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the planning and development of the WEB Pipeline Project in South Dakota.
